title: #' Merge BAM Files using Rust Backend — mergebams
text: function takes vectors file paths BAM files, single output path merged BAM file, list read names, vector prefixes applied. performs merge operation using Rust backend. function expects bams, out_path, prefixes parameters non-null properly formatted. names parameter list can contain NULL values BAM files without associated read names. non-NULL element names character vector read names. Error handling implemented ensure input parameters correct type format. error detected, function prints error message standard error returns early without performing merge operation.
